BETAS.Avi.Monday_0: I have two sons, actually.#$b#A long haired mix, and a feral orange tabby.
BETAS.Avi.Monday_2: Do you ever wonder what it's like on the inside of an author's mind?#$b#It's empty in here.
BETAS.Avi.Monday_3: Under certain circumstances, I could possibly be a human.#$b#But I'd rather not deal with the likes of you.$3
Avi.Monday_1: You will burn in the pyre to hell if you speak to me in 'uwu speak'.
Avi.Monday_2: Is it slavery if I have my own pet orange cat?$3#$b#Eh, whatever.
Avi.Monday_3: Are we dancers?#$b#Or are we cats?
BETAS.Avi.Tuesday_1: Which reminds me, I have not yet met my quota for -=()posting.
BETAS.Avi.Tuesday_2: The Boncher mod took a solid 54 minutes to make.
BETAS.Avi.Tuesday_3: Mothman took a good 48 hours to make.
Avi.Tuesday_0: Over the course of the first year of work on Voidsent, I've gone through many transitions.#$b#Not actual physical transitions, mind you.#$b#I had created several different kinds of mods to expand my repertoire.#$b#Started art work projects that I never deemed possible before.#$b#Made a lot of good friends along the way.#$b#The friends you see around me, sans my husband, are just a few that have helped me and comforted me.#$b#Iro is still a -=() though.#$action {0}DialogueBox {1}Placeholder "‚ôãÔ∏é‚¨•Ô∏é‚¨•Ô∏é‚¨•Ô∏é ‚ß´Ô∏é‚ôíÔ∏é‚ôãÔ∏é‚ß´Ô∏é‚ùºÔ∏é‚¨ßÔ∏é ‚¨ßÔ∏é‚ñ°Ô∏é ‚ôçÔ∏é‚óÜÔ∏é‚ß´Ô∏é‚ôèÔ∏é ‚úãÔ∏é‚ùºÔ∏é‚ùçÔ∏é ‚ôëÔ∏é‚ñ°Ô∏é‚ôìÔ∏é‚ñ†Ô∏é‚ôëÔ∏é ‚ß´Ô∏é‚ñ°Ô∏é ‚ôåÔ∏é‚óÜÔ∏é‚óèÔ∏é‚óèÔ∏é‚çìÔ∏é ‚çìÔ∏é‚ñ°Ô∏é‚óÜÔ∏é ‚ôãÔ∏é‚ôåÔ∏é‚ñ°Ô∏é‚óÜÔ∏é‚ß´Ô∏é ‚ß´Ô∏é‚ôíÔ∏é‚ôìÔ∏é‚¨ßÔ∏é ‚ôêÔ∏é‚ñ°Ô∏é‚ùíÔ∏é‚ôèÔ∏é‚ùñÔ∏é‚ôèÔ∏é‚ùíÔ∏é"#$b#Yeah, yeah, shut up wingdings.$3
Avi.Tuesday_1: That isn't to say my other friends aren't -=()ters, they're just -=()ters in their own ways.
Avi.Tuesday_2: A collective of -=()s, I should make a new word for that...$2
Avi.Tuesday_3: Should I call it a -=()storm?$2#$action {0}DialogueBox {1}Placeholder "Why not a murder of -=()s?" Portraits/{1}Nox Nox#$b#...?$3#$action {0}DialogueBox {1}Placeholder "‚úãÔ∏é‚ß´Ô∏é ‚¨•Ô∏é‚ôãÔ∏é‚¨ßÔ∏é ‚ôåÔ∏é‚ôèÔ∏é‚ß´Ô∏é‚¨•Ô∏é‚ôèÔ∏é‚ôèÔ∏é‚ñ†Ô∏é üòêÔ∏é‚ôìÔ∏é‚¨ßÔ∏é ‚ñ°Ô∏é‚ùíÔ∏é ‚ò†Ô∏é‚ñ°Ô∏é‚åßÔ∏éüì™Ô∏é ‚ò†Ô∏é‚ñ°Ô∏é‚åßÔ∏é ‚¨•Ô∏é‚ñ°Ô∏é‚ñ†Ô∏éüì¨Ô∏é" Portraits/{1}Iro Iro
BETAS.Avi.Wednesday_1: You don't have to remind me.$3
BETAS.Avi.Wednesday_2: I'm not proud of that bout of mania.$3
BETAS.Avi.Wednesday_3: While it taught me a lot of things, it opened the flood gates to things I wished I never had seen.$3
Avi.Wednesday_0: There are some things I regret in life.#$b#That being The Mod That Shall Not Be Named.$3
Avi.Wednesday_1: Will I ever make an hour long event cutscene again?#$b#I don't know, do YOU want one?$3
Avi.Wednesday_2: ...I'm hungry.#$action {0}DialogueBox {1}Placeholder "What do you want to eat?" Portraits/{1}Joh Joh#$b#...I don't know.$3#$action {0}DialogueBox {1}Placeholder "...$1" Portraits/{1}Joh Joh#$b#What?$3#$action {0}DialogueBox {1}Placeholder "...Nothing, love.$3" Portraits/{1}Joh Joh
Avi.Wednesday_3: In the end, all I am on this screen are a series of randomized pixels, numbers, and screaming.
BETAS.Avi.Thursday_0: I think my upbringing on MMOs, jRPGs, and story-driven games are the reason why I wanted my own expansion.
BETAS.Avi.Thursday_1: You're talking to the 'me' that I've written, isn't that weird?
BETAS.Avi.Thursday_2: Makes you wonder what goes on when someone contemplates making a mod for their own purpose.
BETAS.Avi.Thursday_3: Personally, I didn't make Voidsent for anyone but myself.
Avi.Thursday_0: If you're really curious, Iro speaks in ciphers and wingdings.
Avi.Thursday_1: Will you manage to get the museum items from all of us 'cats'?
Avi.Thursday_2: Have you spoken to all of us every single day for a year? I'm counting.
Avi.Thursday_3: Did you know the spinning stardrops hold Final Fantasy-style battles that give you combat experience?#$b#It was a pain in the ass to script.
BETAS.Avi.Friday_0: Are you enjoying Voidsent so far?
BETAS.Avi.Friday_1: I guess it is quite weird for the creator of a mod to not be a tia, but I don't want anyone to romance me.
BETAS.Avi.Friday_2: Happily married and I don't really care all that much to be likeable by the populace.
BETAS.Avi.Friday_3: There are always the weirdoes who will probably make a tiaoid version of this NPC, and I will look at them in disgust.$3
Avi.Friday_0: I long for the day where I can sunbathe like my sons.#$b#In front of a window in a sunroom, chores done for the day.#$b#Yet I must toil, working a menial job as I continue my hobbies to keep myself sane.
Avi.Friday_1: If we look back at the history of my modwork, going from portraits and sprites to a full blown expansion is quite a leap.#$b#I had a lot of fun learning and breaking things in real time.#$b#There's just nothing like seeing your own creation instantly in front of you quite like modwork.
Avi.Friday_2: At first, Voidsent was going to be a 'Grandberg Lands' expansion, and then I didn't really care to write about real-world war.#$b#Being someone who lives in a war-driven country has made me jaded to it and I felt like I wouldn't do a realistic-war story justice.#$b#That being said, Konryn has his own pitfalls and fallacies that doesn't quite set this as a full blown country-versus-country war.#$b#Civil wars are important, but I wanted to go in depth of the psyche of a character.
Avi.Friday_3: At first, Kis was going to do the mapwork for all of Voidsent, I was going to commission her so that I could get a grasp of the beautiful farms she's created.#$b#I got impatient, and we now have what we get now.#$b#I'm still quite proud of what I've done so far with my own hands, and it could be better.#$b#But that's for a different time.#$b#And maybe a content update.
BETAS.Avi.Saturday_0: Well that was fucking sappy now wasn't it.
BETAS.Avi.Saturday_1: And no, if someone tries to romance this NPC or my husband's NPC I will be sorely disgusted.
BETAS.Avi.Saturday_2: You ask why I put them in, then?#$b#Because it's a fun bout of dialogue seeing inside of the house that made this home, isn't it?
BETAS.Avi.Saturday_3: Peering into the mind of the author and my circumstances, as it is.#$b#If you cared so much to talk to this NPC and realize that I'm a strong fourth wall breaker, maybe this is a breath of fresh air.#$b#Maybe you're offput by the fact that I break the fourth wall so often.#$b#You're free to stop talking to this NPC.#$b#Free will is a thing, after all.
Avi.Saturday_0: My own personal cat is where I, as the author of Voidsent, want to rant about the makings of this entire process as well as the credits given all around.#$b#Consider this the credit roll, a bow out of the actors involved.#$b#If it weren't for the community and its boundless love for the game, I wouldn't have continued this project.#$b#Though they aren't explicitly here, I'd like to thank a few people like Abagaianye, Pixeltica, Spiderbuttons, Mushymato, Rokugin, and the Sunberry team.#$b#Some of them have seen me from the very start of my mod career and seen me go from pool floaties to sky-diving off the top rope within a short amount of time.#$b#There are multitudes of others I'd like to thank but then we'd just be here for forever, wouldn't we?
Avi.Saturday_1: Even though I gripe about The Mod That Shall Not Be Named, having an entire archive-of-our-own fanfiction dedicated to it made my cold, dead heart, warm again.
Avi.Saturday_2: Do I care about Voidsent being translated to other languages?#$b#No, not really.#$b#This is something near and dear to my heart that I would like to translate of my own accord, no machine translations to botch the sensibility of the feelings I wanted to get across in English.
Avi.Saturday_3: Of course, there's always those that want to profit off of the work of others.#$b#Voidsent is a labor of love that I've cared for, for well over a year at this point in July of 2025.
BETAS.Avi.Sunday_0: This cat has turned into a mushfest, gross.
BETAS.Avi.Sunday_1: If you're still listening, good morning, good afternoon, and if I don't see you, good night.
BETAS.Avi.Sunday_2: It's a wonder you've spoken to the cats this often that you keep coming back for more.
BETAS.Avi.Sunday_3: Are we actually cats?#$b#No, we're just pixels.#$b#But so are you.
Avi.Sunday_0: And thus, we come to the last bits of dialogue for this cat.#$b#I had a lot of fun making this mod, and I hope you, too, enjoy the experience.#$b#After all, consider this a diary of my own, open to the public to enjoy the sentiments of an author.
Avi.Sunday_1: Whether you're a friend of mine, some random just downloading this mod and happening upon this cat and going, 'what the actual--'.#$b#There were a lot of mechanics I wanted to play with in my own game of Stardew.#$b#I wanted livelier NPCs, more immersive talking, combat mechanics that were fun but not grating.#$b#I wanted an experience that made me want to keep on playing.#$b#To see if anything could grip me long enough and still come back to it.#$b#I'm still trying, as a writer, I'd like it if people saw my art in all of its forms as inspiring.#$b#Maybe, you, too, could become a mod author.#$b#Please, for the love of god read wikis though.
Avi.Sunday_2: You might be asking why I just didn't go into a career for game development, the short answer is that I didn't really go to school for it.#$b#The long answer for it is that I don't think I could continue the creative streak if it were my job.
Avi.Sunday_3: I leave this dialogue open to make a final tally of all of the words written for Voidsent.#$b#My love letter to those lost, a memory of my beloved father, a digital memoir for myself.
